title: First Rebel Wisdom QnA - questions please!
description:
First Rebel Wisdom QnA - questions please!

On Thursday, David and Alexander will host the first Rebel Wisdom QnA. Please ask questions in the comments below - and we'll aim to answer as many as we can on Thurs. 

Refer to our recent videos for possible topics.

Jordan Peterson vs Sam Harris: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fv-HBQstiYw&t=956s

Interview with Paul VanderKlay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o1OMqErdDGk&t=315s

Glitch in the Matrix: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=trhTbEs2GGE&t=10s

To help us make more of these films, please consider sponsoring us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rebelwisdom

transcript_parts.text: hey guys this is a very short video

community starting to build around the

something we really want to encourage
and if you guys have any got got any
ideas about how to encourage that a

we made our first film in January and

because especially the intellectual dark
web feels like it's a way of trying to
have to carve out a space to be able to
have these kind of conversations in
